Event.Message: The file %2 could not be processed by the application %1 because it requires IndeoÂ® Decoders of type %3
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ApplicationName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="FileName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="ContentType" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: Initialize: Found %1 Preferred Filter clsids, %2 Do Not Use Filter clsids.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="PreferredCount" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="DontUseCount" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: Attempt to use Filter clsid %1 marked as do not use.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="clsid" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> </template>

Event.Message: Mark Filter clsid %1 do not use = %2.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="clsid" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="Disabled" inType="win:Boolean" outType="xs:boolean"/> </template>

Event.Message: Choosing preferred Filter clsid %1 for subtype %2.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="clsid" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="Subtype" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> </template>

Event.Message: Registering preferred Filter clsid %1 for subtype %2.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="clsid" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="Subtype" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> </template>

Event.Message: Attempt to use Do Not Use VCM codec fourcc %1 DLL name %2.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="FourCC" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="dllName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: Query for preferred subtype %2 found clsid %1.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="clsid" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="Subtype" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> </template>

Event.Message: Query for preferred subtype %1 found no clsid.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Subtype" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> </template>

Event.Message: Query Do Not Use for clsid %1: do not use = %2
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="clsid" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="Disabled" inType="win:Boolean" outType="xs:boolean"/> </template>
